Notes: This script is designed to be run after an initial Arch Linux installation.
The script includes options for installing various software packages, including desktop environments, applications, and system tools.
The script also includes options for configuring system settings, such as the hostname, timezone, and hardware clock.
The script makes use of the AUR (Arch User Repository) to install certain packages that are not available in the official Arch Linux repositories.
The script is well-documented, with explanations for each option and the corresponding commands.
